text: Then\f + \fr 25:1 \ft Hebrew “And” \f* Bildad the Shuhite answered and ⸤said⸥,\f + \fr 25:1 \ft Hebrew “he said” \f*
who makes peace in his high heavens.
Is there a number to his troops?
And upon whom does his light not rise?
“Indeed,\f + \fr 25:4 \ft Hebrew “And” \f* how can a human being be righteous before God?
And how will he who is born of a woman be pure?
Look, even \add the\add* moon ⸤is not bright⸥,\f + \fr 25:5 \ft Literally “and it is not bright” \f*
and \add the\add* stars are not pure in his sight.
⸤How much less⸥\f + \fr 25:6 \ft Literally “Also” \f* for a human being \add who is\add* a maggot,
and ⸤a human⸥\f + \fr 25:6 \ft Literally “a son of man,” or “a son of Adam” \f* \add who is\add* a worm?”
